name: IM Yell
author: Ron Steedly

sections.description: IM Yell was designed to allow Bloggers and Internet Marketers a quick way to select text in the visual editor and give it a colored background. It now uses the native mceTiny background color selector and icon.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire folder ‘im-yell’ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.0.3

re-write of the entire plugin. now has the highlighter icon and color selector native to mceTiny.

0.0.2

changed directory from imyell to im-yell to match WP SVN directory.

0.0.1

  • initial release
